CHAT.comment: Freeplay. Mother and Child sit on floor playing with box of experimenter provided toys. First they play with a shapes truck; then with giant Lego blocks. Mother tries to play with blocks while Child tries to return to truck. Child is fairly intelligible.

u.a: tries new block in wrong hole .
gazes at truck window but then points at shape .
starts to hand shape to Mother; throws on floor .
tries to place his own shape in a hole .
starts to push through; then pulls back out .
picks up a shape and tries a hole .
tries shape in hole; gets it turned around right .
trying to find hole for new shape .
whines; puts shape down by Mother .
picks up shape and holds correctly oriented .
bangs on plastic box of Legos .
tries; then throws shape at Mother; whines .
dumps out blocks with a clatter .
rocket sound as he plays with block .
bangs truck down with satisfaction; simultaneous .
tries to put block through hole in truck .
tries to get shapes out of truck .
opens door to truck and dumps shapes on floor .
picks up a shape and puts in through door .
plays with truck; ignores Mother; talks to self .
shuts door on truck; plays with blocks .
plays with truck , ignores M , talking to self .
trying to place shape in hole of truck .
tries hole; give up and hands shape to Mother .
